sentences.en: Anyone who has overpaid tax will be able to backdate their claim to last April.
sentences.cn: 超额纳税者申领退款可以从去年4月算起。

sentences.en: Backdate your invoice to April 1 st.
sentences.cn: 你的发票日期应填到4月1日算起.

sentences.en: The contract that was signed on Thursday morning was backdated to March 11.
sentences.cn: 星期四上午所签的合同从3月11日起生效。

trans.tran_en: to write an earlier date on a document or cheque than when it was actually written

trans.tran_cn: 倒填日期，使（付款等）在较早的日期开始生效
